name: Bot Bar Keeper
description:
Welcome to Bot Bar Keeper !

Created by only one person, B.B.K. bring out the bartender in you and gives you the keys to manage your own establishment

Take orders from your robot friends and serve them with style !

Nobody likes to wait, and certainly not those piles of junk ! Hurry up before they leave, and be careful to not make a mistake in their order !

Games Features :

  • 2 Game modes included : Timed & SandBox
  • A bar with a futuristic atmosphere
  • Immersive audio
  • 11 background music (also created by me) to play in epic conditions !
  • A lot of drinks combinations
  • 9 Achievements to unlock
  • And some surprises ... ;)

Coming Soon :

  • More drinks combinations
  • More maps
  • More robots
  • French Language
